title: Pandemic-era checks rewired how these Americans see money: 'Stimulus changed how I think about what's possible'
content: Recipients of pandemic stimulus checks used funds to reduce debt, pay bills and build savings. For some, the money altered their financial psychology.

title: Here are the three things the Fed has done wrong, and what it still isn't getting right
content: The Federal Reserve suddenly finds itself second-guessed as it tries to navigate the economy through inflation and away from recession.

title: Brex drops tens of thousands of small business customers as Silicon Valley adjusts to new reality
content: The move is the latest sign of a sea change occurring among start-ups as an abrupt shift in market conditions is forcing a new discipline on companies.

title: As SEC charges first brokerage to run afoul of new investor protection rule, here's how to find a good financial advisor
content: It may seem challenging to find a broker, financial advisor or financial planner you can trust. Here are some steps consumers can take to protect themselves.

title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Seagen, Moderna, Utz, Kroger and more
content: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

title: China's Xi says trade with Russia expected to hit new records in the coming months
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping on Friday spoke via video at a St. Petersburg International Economic Forum plenary session opened by Russia's Putin.

title: Fed promises 'unconditional' approach to taking down inflation in report to Congress
content: Federal Reserve officials rolled out strong language Friday to describe their approach to inflation, promising a full-fledged effort to restore price stability.

title: Powell vows that the Fed is 'acutely focused' on bringing down inflation
content: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell on Friday reiterated the central bank's commitment to bringing down inflation.

title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: JD.com, Roku, Alibaba and more
content: These are the stocks posting the largest moves before the bell.

title: Dalio is right to short Europe, strategist says: 'The pain will go on for quite a while'
content: Billionaire investor Ray Dalio is right to have bet big against European stocks, according to Beat Wittmann, partner at Porta Advisors.

title: China's property troubles have pushed one debt indicator above levels seen in the financial crisis
content: A measure of risk levels for Asia debt surpassed its 2009 financial crisis high, thanks to a surge in downgrades of Chinese property developers, Moody's said.

title: This fund may be an attractive move for investors in volatile, inflationary markets, Amplify ETFs CEO says
content: Investors may want to consider a special fund focused on high dividend yielding large-caps, according to a leading ETF fund manager.

title: Amid high inflation, 36% of employees earning $100,000 or more say they are living paycheck to paycheck
content: The share of workers earning at least $100,000 a year who report being cash-strapped is double what it was three years ago.

title: A day after Powell's assurances about the economy, markets are worried that 'the Fed breaks something'
content: The trouble is, the Fed's likely to get a recession anyway as data shows the economy is a far cry from stable.

title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Jabil, Commercial Metals, Tesla and more
content: These are the stocks posting the largest moves before the bell.

title: Billionaire investor Orlando Bravo warns there's 'more pain to come' for the tech sector
content: Investors asking tech firms for a path to profitability are "not going to love what they see," Bravo said.

title: Goldman says Beijing is stepping up support for businesses — and names stocks that will get a boost
content: Whether it's more government spending or an interest rate cut, Goldman Sachs is expecting a range of policy support in China — and has stock picks for each policy.

title: Dow sinks 700 points, dropping back below 30,000 to the lowest level in more than a year
content: Dow sinks 700 points, dropping back below 30,000 to the lowest level in more than a year.

title: Powell says the Fed could hike rates by 0.75 percentage point again in July
content: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said Wednesday the central bank could raise interest rates by a similar magnitude at the next policy meeting in July.

title: Fed members predict more hikes with the benchmark rate above 3% by year-end
content: The Federal Reserve expects the fed funds rate to increase by another roughly 1.75 percentage points over the next four policy meetings to end the year at 3.4%.

title: Here's what changed in the new Fed statement
content: This is a comparison of Wednesday's Federal Open Market Committee statement with the one issued after the Fed's previous policymaking meeting on May 4.

title: Fed hikes its benchmark interest rate by 0.75 percentage point, the biggest increase since 1994
content: The Federal Open Market Committee released its decision on interest rates Wednesday, with markets expecting a three-quarter point hike.

title: It's a daunting time for retirees, who face the biggest inflation threat, financial advisors say
content: Seniors living on fixed incomes may have a tough time adjusting to rapidly rising costs for consumer goods and services.

title: Sen. Warren asks bank regulator to reject TD's $13.4 billion acquisition after customer-abuse report
content: In a letter sent Tuesday to the OCC, Warren cited a May 4 report that alleged that TD used tactics similar to those in the Wells Fargo fake accounts scandal.

title: Here's everything the Fed is expected to announce, including the biggest rate hike in 28 years
content: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday is expected to do something it hasn't done in 28 years — increase interest rates by three-quarters of a percentage point.

title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Baidu, MicroStrategy, Moderna and more
content: These are the stocks posting the largest moves before the bell.

title: Robinhood to fall to $5 as trading slows, main revenue source is threatened, Atlantic Equities says
content: A recovery for Robinhood may not be in the cards anytime soon, according to Atlantic Equities.

title: Bill Gates says crypto and NFTs are '100% based on greater fool theory'
content: The tech billionaire said he's "not involved" in crypto: "I'm not long or short any of those things."

title: China's economic numbers come in better than expected, but 'difficulties and challenges' remain
content: China released economic data for May that topped muted expectations for a month hampered by Covid controls.

title: Luxury brands say China's latest Covid wave has whacked consumer demand
content: Luxury brands have slashed expectations for their China business this year after the country's latest Covid lockdowns, according to an Oliver Wyman survey.
